categories: Category:Events during the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: A skirmish took place on Coruscant around 3643 BBY during the Cold War. The Mandalorian soldier Dao Stryver attacked thugs affiliated with the Black Sun organization while searching for information regarding the starship Cinzia. Late in the battle, Jedi Knight Shigar Konshi and the Republic trooper-turned-vigilante Larin Moxla simultaneously arrived on the scene. The duo was subsequently attacked by Stryver; however, after a fierce firefight, the Mandalorian escaped.
